articles.description: Boy, 11, was followed by two men, Ms Blackman has said
articles.content:
Line of Duty actor Sherise Blackman says she was very dissatisfied with the polices initial reaction after men attempted to kidnap her son.
Ms Blackman, who portrays Ruby Jones on the BBC police dra… [+2141 chars]
